scripts.build:test: yarn build && yarn clean && yarn test
scripts.build:test:app2: yarn build && yarn clean && yarn test:app2
scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.link:schematic: yarn link && cd sandbox && yarn link @ikamva/ngx-tailwindcss
scripts.test: yarn clean && yarn sandbox:ng-add && yarn test:sandbox
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn build
scripts.release: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn np --no-tests
